import React from 'react' import ReactDom from 'react-dom' import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch'; import '../static/css/detail.css' import { Carousel } from 'antd' import Interest from '../components/Interest' import Nav from "../components/Nav" import Footer from "../components/Footer" import { Breadcrumb } from 'antd'; import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import { withRouter } from 'next/router'; var routeid; class About extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { msg: [], msg1: [] } } componentDidMount() { routeid=this.props.router.query.id console.log(this.props.data1,this.props.data) const message1 = this.props.data1.message const { message } = this.props.data console.log(message1) this.setState(() => ({ msg: [...message], msg1: [...message1] }), () => { this.setState({ url1: this.state.msg[0].lunbo1, url2: this.state.msg[1].lunbo1, url3: this.state.msg[2].lunbo1, url4: this.state.msg[3].lunbo1, url5: this.state.msg[0].rname, url6: this.state.msg[1].rname, url7: this.state.msg[2].rname, url8: this.state.msg[3].rname, url9: this.state.msg[0].gonum, url10: this.state.msg[1].gonum, url11: this.state.msg[2].gonum, url12: this.state.msg[3].gonum, lunbo1: this.state.msg1[0].lunbo1, lunbo2: this.state.msg1[0].lunbo2, lunbo3: this.state.msg1[0].lunbo3, rname: this.state.msg1[0].rname, content: this.state.msg1[0].content, days: this.state.msg1[0].days, destination: this.state.msg1[0].destination, id: this.state.msg1[0].id, special: this.state.msg1[0].special, }) }) } render() { return (

景点介绍

厦门市博物馆是我国东南地区的一座重要的地方综合性博物馆，致力于我国东南地区特别是闽台两岸珍贵文化遗产的收藏、保护、 研究与展示，利用博物馆直观的展品和各种展示手段，宣传国家文物政策，普及文物考古和历史知识，弘扬和保护中华民族优秀的文化遗产， 保存历史记忆，激励人们树立民族自信心和爱国的高尚情操。

) } } About.getInitialProps = async function () { const res1 = await fetch(`http://formywei.club:9191/api/getroutedetail/${routeid}`); const res = await fetch('http://formywei.club:9191/api/getinterest'); // console.log(res) const data1 = await res1.json(); const data = await res.json(); return { data1, data }; } export default withRouter(About);
